content: The File class in Java is a representation of a file or a directory pathname. Methods within this class allow you to manipulate and work with different files, change names, and change directory paths. For the purposes of this tooling, we should just understand how to initialize a File!
name: File

methods.name: File
methods.content: This is the constructor of the File object that allows you to specify a pathname of type String.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"pathname","type":"String","required":true,"description":"This is the name of file or directory."}]
